content.webTitle: Choose your favourite stage show of 2019

fields.headline: Choose your favourite stage show of 2019
fields.bodyText: Share your thoughts What was your favourite theatre, comedy or dance show of the year? Please briefly explain why (250 words max) by filling in the form below and we will feature a selection of them. You have until Friday 13 December to submit your suggestions. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
